name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use Rundll32
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Rundll32 in Scripts
query: (winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/ AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*\&\&.*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32.*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]32\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]_[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:(/.*[Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Mm][Ss][Pp][Ee][Cc].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Ee][Xx].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\&&* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*rundll32* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*shell32.dll* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*shellexec_rundll* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:(*value* OR *invoke* OR *comspec* OR *iex*))`
